title: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering For Women: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering For Women Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering For Women Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering For Women Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women Key Facts
Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women Courses Details
description: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women provides UG and PG courses in technology. The B.Tech course provided by the college has 4 specializations and a new specialization is also added from 2020 named Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning. The M.Tech course also has a new specialization from 2020 named Data Science. Following are the details for the same.
Check: GVPCEW, Visakhapatnam Courses and Fees

basic_info.name: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women Placement
description: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women has a dedicated placement cell working efficiently to provide placement assistance to the students. This cell is also responsible for providing pre-placement training to the students. This Cell helps students to prepare for their assessment round, technical round, and even interview round. For this training and placement cell arranges various training sessions, workshops, seminars for the students.

basic_info.name: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women Faculty
description: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women comprises prominent faculty members. Each member of the faculty has years of experience and expertise in their fields. Teachers at college are very passionate and possess deep knowledge about their subjects and work towards preparing their students for the best in industry.

Institute has 15 faculty members. Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering has 3 faculty members and the remaining; Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering, Department of Information Technology, and Department of Computer Science & Engineering comprise 4 faculty members in each department.

basic_info.name: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women FAQs

faqs.question: Does Gayatri Vidya Parishad College have a hostel facility?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. Gayatri Vidya Parishad College has a hostel facility.

faqs.question: What is the intake capacity of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College for the B.Tech course?
faqs.answer: Ans.Electronics & Communication Engineering and Computer Science & Engineering branches have an intake of 120 students while the remaining batches have an intake capacity of only 60 students.

faqs.question: What is the intake capacity of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College for the M.Tech course?
faqs.answer: Ans.Both the branches of M.Tech accept only 18 applications each year at Gayatri Vidya Parishad College.

faqs.question: How many students got placed in 2020 from the Electronics & Communication Engineering department of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College?
faqs.answer: Ans.In 2020, 61 out of 120 students received placement from the Electronics & Communication Engineering department of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College.

faqs.question: Does the Gayatri Vidya Parishad College have laboratories?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. The college is equipped with state of art laboratories and spacious full-fledged labs functioning under various departments. All the labs are developed as per the JNTUK curriculum and monitored by senior professors of the concerned departments with emphasis on providing hassle-free practical learning environments.

Section.name: About GVPW
Section.description:
Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women, established in 2021, affiliated to JNTUK and approved & accredited by AICTE and NBA. The college offers B.Tech courses across various specializations such as Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, and Information Technology courses.
The JEE Mains or AP-EAMCET entrance exam is compulsory for admission to engineering and technology courses at Gayatri Vidya Parishad College. Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women has an active relationship with over 30+ companies for placement assistance. In the 2020 batch, 200+ students got placed in MNCs like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and many more.
Check: GVPCEW, Visakhapatnam Placement
Table of Content
Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women provides UG and PG courses in technology. The B.Tech course provided by the college has 4 specializations and a new specialization is also added from 2020 named Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning. The M.Tech course also has a new specialization from 2020 named Data Science. Following are the details for the same.

Ques. Does Gayatri Vidya Parishad College have a hostel facility?
Ans. Yes. Gayatri Vidya Parishad College has a hostel facility.
Ques. What is the intake capacity of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College for the B.Tech course?
Ans. Electronics & Communication Engineering and Computer Science & Engineering branches have an intake of 120 students while the remaining batches have an intake capacity of only 60 students.
Ques. What is the intake capacity of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College for the M.Tech course?
Ans. Both the branches of M.Tech accept only 18 applications each year at Gayatri Vidya Parishad College.
Ques. How many students got placed in 2020 from the Electronics & Communication Engineering department of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College?
Ans. In 2020, 61 out of 120 students received placement from the Electronics & Communication Engineering department of Gayatri Vidya Parishad College.
Ques. Does the Gayatri Vidya Parishad College have laboratories?
Ans. Yes. The college is equipped with state of art laboratories and spacious full-fledged labs functioning under various departments. All the labs are developed as per the JNTUK curriculum and monitored by senior professors of the concerned departments with emphasis on providing hassle-free practical learning environments.
